paper_abstract: An RNA secondary structure is considered to be planar if its arc graph can be embedded into a plane without edge crossing. In this paper, a graphical criterion of planarity is presented based on graphical composition for RNA secondary structures with pseudoknots in Rivas-Eddy Class. Effective planar testing algorithms are introduced based on our graphical criterion. (C) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A graphical criterion of planarity for RNA secondary structures with pseudoknots in Rivas-Eddy class
